TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabPage extends System.Windows.Forms.Panel

summary.span: 表示 中的单个选项卡页。

span.span: Represents a single tab page in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件表示 控件中的选项卡式页。 controls represent the tabbed pages in a control. 集合中选项卡页的顺序反映了 控件中选项卡的顺序。The order of tab pages in the collection reflects the order of tabs in the control. 若要更改控件中选项卡的顺序，您必须通过删除它们并将其插入到新索引来更改它们在集合中的位置。To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes. 控件受其容器的约束，因此从 基类继承的某些属性将不起作用，包括 、、、、和 。 controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the base class will have no effect, including , , , , , and . 中的选项卡是 的一部分，但不是单个 控件的组成部分。The tabs in a are part of the but not parts of the individual controls. 类的成员（如 属性）仅影响选项卡页的客户端矩形，而不影响选项卡。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外， 的 方法不会隐藏选项卡。若要隐藏选项卡，必须从 集合中删除 控件。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]中，选项卡被视为选项卡页的一部分，用于确定 的 和 事件发生的时间。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，当焦点进入或离开某个选项卡时，将不会发生 的 和 事件，但仅当焦点进入或离开选项卡页的客户端矩形时才会发生。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 有关此控件如何响应 和 方法的详细信息，请参阅以下 成员： 、、、、、。For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . > [!NOTE] > 在显示选项卡页之前，不会创建 中包含的控件，并且在显示该选项卡页之前，不会激活这些控件中的任何数据绑定。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]中， 属性允许您指示是否应使用当前视觉样式呈现选项卡页的背景。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style. 仅当同时 `true` 和 属性值，并且 父 的 属性时，才会发生这种情况。This occurs only when the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is . 否则，会正常绘制背景。Otherwise, the background is painted normally. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有一个 的 。The following code example creates a with one . [!code-cpp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的默认值是 属性的值，除非 和 属性值都是 `true` 并且父 的 属性的值为 ，在这种情况下， 属性的默认值为 。The default value of the property is the value of the property unless the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent has a value of , in which case the default value of the property is . 默认情况下，放置在 上的子控件继承 值，因此此行为会导致子控件的背景以当前视觉样式呈现。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 更改 属性的值会自动将 属性设置为 `false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果希望 背景使用视觉样式呈现，但希望子控件继承指定的 值，请在设置 属性后设置 属性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个包含两个 对象的 ，其中每个对象包含一个 组件。The following code example creates a with two objects, each containing one component. 参数 `button2` 传递到 方法，该方法检索包含 `button2`的 。The parameter `button2` is passed to the method, which retrieves the containing `button2`. 为了验证是否检索到了正确的选项卡页， 属性将包含 `button2` 的 设置为当前选定的选项卡页。To verify that the correct tab page is retrieved, the property sets the containing `button2` to the currently selected tab page. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnter (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]中，选项卡被视为选项卡页的一部分，用于确定 的 和 事件发生的时间。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，当焦点进入或离开某个选项卡时，将不会发生 的 和 事件，但仅当焦点进入或离开选项卡页的客户端矩形时才会发生。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: The tab order of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示在用户按窗体上的 TAB 键时，控件接收焦点的顺序。The property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form. 但 控件包含在 控件中，而不是作为窗体 TAB 键顺序的一部分单独接收焦点。 controls are contained within controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order. 因此，此属性对此类没有意义。This property is therefore meaningless for this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 的 属性值为 ，则更改 属性值不会自动在选项卡上将新值居中。Changing the property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the has a property value of . 可以通过以下方式解决此限制：设置 属性，或从 集合中删除 并将其添加回集合。You can work around this limitation by setting the property or by removing the from the collection and adding it back to the collection. 这两个操作都将自动使文本居中。Both of these actions will automatically center the text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有一个 的 。The following code example creates a with one . 属性将选项卡页文本设置为 `myTabPage`。The property sets the tab page text to `myTabPage`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此选项卡页属于 。This tab page belongs to a . 如果 `true`的 属性，当用户将鼠标移到选项卡上时，将显示工具提示文本。The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the property of the is `true`. 有关工具提示的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information about ToolTips, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个具有两个 对象的 。The following code example creates a with two objects. 将 设置为 "允许工具提示"，并向选项卡页分配工具提示文本。The is set to allow ToolTips, and the tab pages are assigned ToolTip text. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当启用视觉样式时， 背景是否使用当前视觉样式呈现。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.

value.span: 表示使用当前视觉样式呈现背景；否则，为 。

span.span: to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 和 属性值都为 `true`时， 背景才使用当前视觉样式。The background uses the current visual style only when the and property values are both `true`. 当同时 `true` 和 属性值，并且 父 的 属性时， 属性的默认值为 。When the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is , the default value of the property is . 默认情况下，放置在 上的子控件继承 值，因此此行为会导致子控件的背景以当前视觉样式呈现。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 更改 属性的值会自动将 属性设置为 `false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果希望 背景使用视觉样式呈现，但希望子控件继承指定的 值，请在设置 属性后设置 属性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性对于此控件无意义，不过您可以更改其值并处理 事件以检测更改。The property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the event to detect the change. 若要在 中隐藏选项卡，必须从控件的 集合中将其删除。To hide a tab in a , you must remove it from the control's collection.
